queries.name: IOT platform - turbine status

query_draft.draft_text:
select *, CASE WHEN prediction = 'ok' THEN 'Healthy' ELSE CONCAT('Faulty (', prediction, ')') END as status 
  from main__build.dbdemos_iot_turbine.turbine_current_status where turbine_id= '{{ turbine_id }}'
query_draft.original_query_text: select *, CASE WHEN prediction = 'ok' THEN 'Healthy' ELSE CONCAT('Faulty (', prediction, ')') END as status from dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.current_turbine_metrics where turbine_id= '{{ turbine_id }}'
